content: barwon scarf a knitting pattern by georgie nicolson this bulky knit textured scarf offers a relaxing and mediative knit simple knit and purl stitches combine effortlessly to create a textured chevron stitch pattern that is so much easier to knit than it appears the stitch pattern is reversible making this the perfect scarf that will fly off the needles the pattern derives its name from a meandering local river skill level easy 2 | barwon scarf sizing abbreviations length 66½ inches/167 cms k knit width 7½ inches/19 cms p purl st/s stitch/es yarn requirements bendigo woollen mills rustic 12 ply 100% wool 284yd 260m /200g -
